page.title: 03HOME LIFE -TWO
page.content: We found out that there was an even split between the number of homes using electricity and gas to cook their food.At the moment ten percent of people asked, said they used a microwave as their main way of cooking.We are certain that this percentage will increase in the future. The most popular meal is the traditional Roast Beef and Yorkshire Pudding Sunday lunch.Other popular meals were anything with Chips, Chicken, dishes Salad and Pork.From this there does not seem to be many vegetarians in Pelsall. Kebabs, Curry and Chinese were also popular,which seems to show that peoples taste in food is quite wide and varied.
